id.description: The unique identifier for the user

account_id.description: The account ID the user is linked to

locale.description: The locale of the user, in RFC5646 format

startdate.description: Date the user is active in the system

enddate.description: Date the user is inactive in the system

street_address.description: Only available with `View user details`, `View all users` or `View own profile` permission.

post_code.description: Only visible with `View user details`, `View all users` or `View own profile` permission.

city.description: Only available with `View user details`, `View all users` or `View own profile` permission.

phone_nr.description: Only available with `View user details`, `View all users` or `View own profile` permission.

mobile_nr.description: Only available with `View user details`, `View all users` or `View own profile` permission.

emergency_nr.description: Only available with `View user details`, `View all users` or `View own profile` permission.

email.description: Only available with `View user details`, `View all users` or `View own profile` permission.

verified.description: Whenever the user has verified the email. Only available with `View user details`, `View all users` or `View own profile` permission.

hire_date.description: Date the user is hired. Only available with `View user details` or `View own profile` permission.

birthplace.description: Only available with `View user details` or `View own profile` permission.

birthdate.description: Only available with `View user details` or `View own profile` permission.

nationality.description: Nationality of user. Only available with `View user details` or `View own profile` permission.

ssn.description: Field for social security number of user. Only visible with `View user details` or `View own profile` permission.

passport_number.description: Document number of passport. Only available with `View user details` or `View own profile` permission.

banknr.description: Bank number of user. Only available with `View user details` or `View own profile` permission.

nr_of_logins.description: Number of logins. Only available with `View user details` or `View own profile` permission.

last_login.description: Date of the last login. Only available with `View user details` or `View own profile` permission.

employee_nr.description: Only available with `View user details` or `View own profile` permission.

custom_fields.description: User custom fields. Key value, where the key is the custom field id

roster_note.description: Note that shows up in the schedule for this user. Only available with `Edit roster`, `Create Roster` or `Edit users` permission.

invited.description: Whenever the user is invited. Only available with `Edit users`

plus_min_hours.description: Plus min hours of user. Only available with `View plus min hours` permission.

birthday.description: Date of the next birthday. Only available with `View user details` or `View own profile` permission.

birthday_age.description: Age of the user on birthday date. Only available with `View user details` permission.

age.description: Age of the user. Only available with `View user details` permission.

has_login.description: Whenever the user has set a password. Only available with `View user details` permission.

mfa_enabled.description: Whenever mfa is enabled for user. Only available with `View user details` permission.

language.description: The 2 character language code, based of the locale

avatar_15x15.description: Link to 15 by 15 pixel version of user's avatar

avatar_24x24.description: Link to 24 by 24 pixel version of user's avatar

avatar_30x30.description: Link to 30 by 30 pixel version of user's avatar

avatar_45x45.description: Link to 45 by 45 pixel version of user's avatar

avatar_60x60.description: Link to 60 by 60 pixel version of user's avatar

avatar_150x200.description: Link to 150 by 200 pixel version of user's avatar
